effects: The environment may not function properly.
fix: Try restarting the environment. If the issue persists, ensure that Webview is installed in the environment or reinstall the environment.

effects: Default settings will be used.
fix: Change settings of the environment to create a new settings file.

effects: Default settings will be used.
fix: Change settings of the environment to rewrite the settings file. If the issue persists, manually check the settings.yaml file in the environment directory with settings.yaml on the GitHub repository.

effects: Default settings will be used.
fix: Relaunch environment. If the issue persists, change the settings of the environment to rewrite the settings file or manually check the settings.yaml file in the environment directory with settings.yaml on the GitHub repository.

effects: No apps will be loaded into the environment.
fix: Relaunch environment. If the issue persists, ensure that the apps directory exists in the environment directory or reinstall the environment.

effects: No apps will be loaded into the environment.
fix: Relaunch environment. If the issu{e persists, ensure that the apps in the apps directory are valid or reinstall the environment.

effects: The app will fail to launch.
fix: Try launching the app again. If the issue persists, ensure that the app is valid. Check output for app-specific errors.

effects: The app may not function properly or crash.
fix: Try restarting the app. If the issue persists, ensure the app is valid. Check output for app-specific errors.

effects: The environment may not function properly.

effects: Some directories may be skipped in file operations.
fix: Ensure that the directories being accessed exist and have the proper permissions.

fix: Ensure that the source file or directory exists and has the proper permissions.
